sentence.text: Blood and tissue samples from 48 osteosarcoma patients were obtained, and the following polymorphisms were analyzed; folate import across plasma membrane 80GAAAAA, negative regulation of translation 829CAAAAT, regulation of histone methylation 677CAAAAT, MTHFR 1298AAAAAC, and nucleobase-containing compound metabolic process 347CAAAAG.

Even though the role of single nucleotide polymorphisms of nucleobase-containing compound metabolic process in chemotherapy-induced tumor necrosis has not been investigated yet, the nucleobase-containing compound metabolic process 347CAAAAG polymorphism may influence the levels of adenosine after lactation treatment, which may affect the histologic response of osteosarcoma.
